name: Lorraine, Blademaster
effect: b'Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)\r\nOn Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine\'s attacks get +2 power and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."'
flavor_text: b'"Let me show you true swordistry."'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 8 b'Hori'

name: Lorraine, Crux Knight
effect: b'Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Crux Knight must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)\r\nLorraine\'s attacks get +1 power for each regalia weapon card in your banishment. '
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 7 b'Hori'

name: Rai, Storm Seer
effect: b'Rai Lineage (Rai, Storm Seer must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.)\r\nRai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.'
flavor_text: b'"Ready yourself, otherwise it won\'t be a fair fight." '
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 7 b'Hori'

name: Arcanist's Prism
effect: b'At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.'
flavor_text: b'"Such a curious thing. It seems as though it\'s alive."\r\n\xe2\x80\x94 Rai Kyouki'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Clarent, Sword of Peace
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Remove a durability counter from Clarent: Prevent the next 1 non-attack damage that would be dealt to each unit you control this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b'To protect its owner, it would sacrifice itself.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 3 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Endura, Scepter of Ignition
effect: b'REST, Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.'
flavor_text: b'Its spark glows vibrantly in otherworldly color. Some say the staff has an ominous origin, perhaps from a far more sinister world.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 3 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Prismatic Edge
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Library Witch
effect: b'Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)\r\nOn Death: Draw a card. '
flavor_text: b'The librarians of mage academies instill their love for reading in aspiring students.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'Hanh Chu'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'Hanh Chu'
Dawn of Ashes Prelude 1 b'Hanh Chu'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'Hanh Chu'
